function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex and unobserved process of infection rate generation","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately predicting infection rates and controlling disease spread","Mitigation":"Increased surveillance and data collection, focus on real-time data analysis","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms for predictive modeling, IoT for real-time data collection","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the effect of large-scale policy on behavior and infection rates","Impact":"Ineffective policy implementation, failure to predict the impact of policy changes on disease spread","Mitigation":"Conducting policy impact assessments, scenario planning, stakeholder engagement","Technologies":"Policy modeling software, statistical analysis tools, simulation software","People":"Government policymakers, public health officials, behavioral scientists","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges in estimating the value of local derivatives in infection rate equations","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of how policy changes affect infection rates, leading to ineffective decision-making","Mitigation":"Improved data collection, statistical analysis of causal effects, modeling of potential pathways","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, causal inference algorithms, data visualization tools","People":"Data scientists, statisticians, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
